song.title: Mankind To Dust
song.info:
4th in the Takeover 2001 MP3 competition.
'mankind to dust'
written and produced by jay (c) 2001 rbi studios (r) ralph jacobs
lyrics :
in the perception you live choices to make and answers to give just realize there's is more to find, more ways to expose your mind,
as we walk into the shadow, obvious to the truth, to verify the vision, what makes us who we really are.
